name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 18, a fire broke out in the Jiuding Building in Zigong, Sichuan. Two men drove a construction vehicle to rescue dozens of people near the fire.
It is reported that the fire killed 16 people. After preliminary investigation, the fire was caused by construction work.
https://t.co/VeqUBs6RlT

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 18, the Hong Kong Consumer Council apologized for the Nongfu Spring incident, saying that it was sorry for the misunderstanding caused by the difference in sample classification in the earlier test of Nongfu Spring. After re-scoring, the overall performance of the sample was adjusted from 4.5 stars to 5 stars.
https://t.co/9fn1T7d0Ot

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 17, Luliang, Shanxi. Near Xin'an Street, a man violently beat a woman on the street, smashed her head with a brick, and kicked her several times.
On July 18, the Women's Federation of Xiaoyi City stated that the man was not a local, he came from another place and found the woman and beat her. The local police responded that the man had been detained and the woman was hospitalized for treatment. The police are investigating the specific situation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 16, Shandong. Blogger "Kong Meng Yan Wandering Around the World" interviewed an old man who worked as a sanitation worker in the countryside. The old man said that he was 77 years old, worked 9 hours a day, and had a monthly salary of only 700 yuan. He was also owed wages for several months. The old man also said that his child had died. "The child froze to death, no one took care of him at home, and his mother (wife) had cerebral thrombosis."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Communiqué of the Third Plenary Session of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 18

Communiqué of the Third Plenary Session of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
(Adopted at the Third Plenary Session of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on July 18, 2024)
The Third Plenary Session of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China was held in Beijing from July 15 to 18, 2024.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 18, a letter signed by Zong Fuli to all employees of Wahaha Group circulated online, stating that Zong Fuli had resigned from her positions as chairman and general manager of Wahaha and would no longer be involved in its management. According to Cailian News, several insiders said that the news of Zong Fuli's resignation was true and had been in the works for more than a month.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee accepted the resignation application of Comrade Qin Gang and removed Comrade Qin Gang from his position as a member of the Central Committee.
At the same time, the Plenary Session reviewed and approved the review report of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China on the serious violations of discipline and law by Li Shangfu, Li Yuchao and Sun Jinming, and confirmed the previous decision of the Central Political Bureau to expel Li Shangfu, Li Yuchao and Sun Jinming from the Party.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, no comments are displayed under any reports about Qin Gang on Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On Baidu, the search index for "stroke" skyrocketed in a short period of time, but it is currently banned

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 18, a man holding a belt stopped buses and taxis on the streets of Guangzhou

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the CCTV program "Long Dong Qiang" interviewed Sun Jihai, a former national football team player. Sun Jihai gave the young football players two magic weapons: listen to the coach and follow the party. If they can do these two things, they will be close to success.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 18, Zhoukou, Henan. Flooding in the village after heavy rain. A newlywed couple holds their wedding on a boat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 16, according to the Anhui Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection, a professor was punished for spreading negative energy and wrong views such as "lying flat" and "playing rotten".
The article mentioned that Su was a party member and a professor at the law school of a university. He repeatedly advocated lying flat, playing rotten, speculation, enjoying life in the moment or promoting historical nihilism in class. He was complained by students and interviewed by the Academic Affairs Office, but he still did his own thing and was later pointed out by the inspection.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a "Proposal" issued by the Hainan Catering Association, the Cuisine Association, and the Hainan Hotel and Catering Industry Trade Union Federation was widely forwarded. The proposal mentioned that more than 600,000 catering companies collapsed in the second quarter of this year, and the operating conditions of Hainan's hotel companies took a sharp turn for the worse. Most hotels and catering companies are facing a difficult situation of extreme internal competition, declining customer flow, and general losses. Some companies have taken a series of measures such as reducing staff and reducing wages to maintain operations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 17 (Release), Nanning, Guangxi. A man reported Lei Kangsheng, deputy secretary of the Shilian Village Party Branch, for having affairs with men and women. The man said that Lei Kangsheng destroyed his family and seduced his wife, leading to their final divorce. The man also revealed that he had been married to his wife for five years and had a 4-year-old daughter. "The originally happy family was destroyed by him." As of now, the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The National Bureau of Statistics released the unemployment rate data for June by age group on the 17th. The unemployment rate for the 16-24-year-old labor force was 13.2% in June, and the unemployment rate for the 25-29-year-old labor force was 6.4%, which was ridiculed and questioned by many netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 18, Chongqing. The ceiling of Hechuan Fortune Plaza collapsed. The scene was in a mess, and the injured were carried out.
Hechuan Fortune Plaza: 6 people were slightly injured and no one died. The specific cause is under investigation.
